question: Mrs Barrett, an English-speaking woman who lives in your town, has advertised for someone to help her in her home for a few hours a day next summer.Write a letter to Mrs Barrett. In your letter:• suggest how you could help her in her home• say why you would like to do this work• explain when you will and will not be available
text: I am writing this letter because I saw your advertisement on the internet that you want to hire a person to help you. My name is Emma, I am a student and I can do this.

In the next summer. I am free because I don't need to go to school and I can help you in your hour home for a few hours a day next summer. I want to help you because you are a kind person and very helpful. So I want to do some things that can help you.  I have met you before in a supermarket and you helped me to pay for items when I forgot money. So that is why I really want to help you next summer.  I can do housework even cook for you.
I'm available to do this. Write me back if you read this letter.
